title: A glance at the glories of sacred friendship. By E.B. Esq.
author: Benlowes, Edward, 1603?-1676.
publisher: Printed by R.D. for Humphrey Mosely, at the Princes Arms in St. Pauls Church-yard,
notes: In English and Latin verse -- "Where's Friendship's Residence? To what unknown".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
